name: AMERICA CHANGING
text:
This company has always been a go to for cleaning needs  residential,  and commercial. Best prices for this area by far.

text: So happy with my floors. I chose to go with a darker grey flooring that is scratch proof and waterproof. I have a black lab, so these floors will be so much better than the dingy carpet I had. I called Homewood carpet and flooring, and the same afternoon I ordered my floors. Buk and his helpers were on time and did a fantastic job. They cleaned up very well after laying the floors and were respectful of my furniture and belongings. I live in a 750~ sq ft. Condo, approximately 3/4 of the condo flooring was being redone, and took 10 hours from start to finish. I would highly recommend Homewood Carpet and Flooring. You can’t beat the quality of floors, the timeliness and the accountability they give you for their price. Thank you!

name: Elizabeth Adams
text: Very responsive and helpful! Helped us out in a pinch when our first carpet installer backed out just a few weeks before the project date. Directed me to a carpet that was in stock (and what I wanted) so that the project could move forward on the timeline our business needed. At the install, they discovered an unexpected floor issue which required us to make a last minute change and he handled that and found an available carpet for us. Went above and beyond to make sure our timeline was met! Super nice guys did the install. Great attitudes and a pleasure to work with.

text:
I was pleased with the whole process.  I needed carpet stretched.  I got a fair quote for the work and it was completed sooner than expected.
The two men who stretched the carpet were prompt, courteous, quick workers and they did a great job.  My floors look so much better.

name: Melanie Clark
text: Foo did an amazing job with helping me pick out quality flooring for two basement rooms. He gave a great price and was quick with getting me scheduled. name: Cody Hirsberg
text: We decided to use Homewood Carpet & Flooring based on the referral of a trusted builder. Tyler was excellent to work with regarding sales and selection. He came by the house for measurements and then met us at the showroom to review his recommendations and to make a flooring selection. Foo then organized the install and, because we were in a bind with guests arriving in a few days, was able to install the carpet a day sooner than expected.  Overall, Homewood Carpet and Flooring exceeded expectations which is why they earned this 5-star review.

text: Paul was extremely helpful and responsive throughout our decision making and installation process.   The installation crew was courteous and very hardworking.  Everything was cleaned up and put back in place when they finished.  I have already referred this company to several friends!

name: Britney Henry
text: Paul and his staff did a wonderful job with our flooring project! We had our red oak floors refinished and also had our stairs repaired. They took our very outdated and yellowed flooring and transformed it into a beautiful brown/gray color that is exactly what we had envisioned. They even mixed two of the stains to get the exact color we described. One room had several areas of stains that was so bad I wasn’t sure they would ever look normal, but they were able to make the stains completely disappear. They also replaced a broken part of one step and repaired the stair treads so that they no longer squeak! We are completely satisfied with the job that Homewood Carpet and Flooring did for us and we appreciate their professionalism and thoroughness.

text: I was unsure of what flooring I wanted, Paul was very helpful on helping me decide to refinish my hardwoods or to choose a new floor. I ended up going to his store and we picked out a beautiful floor that I am so proud of. Installation only took maybe 4 hours for my 900 ft. square floor. I would choose them again for my flooring needs. Will be redoing my kitchen floor soon, and definitely plan on calling Homewood Carpet and Flooring.

name: Stacy Strain
text:
We hired them for one couch, one chair, and carpet in a vacant new house. Couldn't be easier. House only one year old. Rep on phone was not polite and not accomodating. When we arrived back after he completed work, there was zero change in the way the carpet looked, we found pins on surface of carpet that a good technician would have found. zero evidence of any cleaning. Called company back. Asked for another rep to come back and they said original rep had to. Company CONTRACTS for their work. Never recommend and never use again.

****ADDITIONS OR RESPONSES after owner response. The Rep referred to was not your wife, but the "contractor" that he said he was doing our carpet. Your wife (or person who scheduled our cleaning) WAS friendly on the phone. If you do not use contractors perhaps the "technician (rep)" shouldn't tell us that.  The stains and lackluster was noticed BEFORE we put any furniture back into the home. Plus, the guy who did the cleaning REQUIRED that we pay prior to the work and to him not the office. Not used to paying prior to work and wont again. Nothing I have said is intentionally false or misleading.  Still highly disappointed in work and don't believe in luck but do thank you for the intended kind ending comment.

resp.text:
UPDATED 10-1-20 after another false claim by Stacy. For anyone reading this....please visit our about us page on our website...https://www.goprosteam.com/about-us/   as you can see Cams' picture and bio are listed and have been on our website for years. Stacy, this is tiring to say the least.  Let me fill you in on a little nugget of information...the technician is not only our employee he is my stepson, so I think we know a thing or two that goes on in our company.  I mean for goodness sake Stacy...we have company vans with our logo, company name, address and phone number plastered all over it with an expensive van wrap...do you think any company is gonna let a "contractor" drive their company vans?  They are not, so again, either you are confused or making this stuff up for whatever reason you have...not sure...maybe you are just having a bad week...still no reason to dump all over us. The reason you were required to pay upfront is because both you and your husband were leaving the house, this is company policy..otherwise if a customer stays they pay after work is completed.  Also...if Cam left a busines card with our logo all over it, it says his title "OPERATIONS MANAGER".  We have already asked Cam about his experience with you, as a matter of fact the only communication he had with you was on the phone when he called to ask a few directions to your home while he was on the way...you were not even there when the cleaning intially started, your husband was...so no Cam has no reason to tell you he is a contractor.  By the way....you did not pay Cam, he carries a credit card reader that is mobile, you were charged by my company...would you like to see a copy of the receipt?  Ive been more than nice to you over this but you keep making false claims.  Again I appreciate your business but please stop this...it is making you look foolish.  Once again we wish you all the luck in your new home.

Hi Stacy.  This is Matt Lowery, co owner and founder of Pro Steam Carpet Care.  First let me say it is unfortunate that you feel the need to leave such a false review of our company.  Secondly here is the url to our about us page on our website  https://www.goprosteam.com/about-us/  as you can see it has Cams' bio on there and states he is our OPERATIONS MANAGER, not a contractor so let me clear some things up for you.  Firstly...the "rep" on the phone is my wife and gets compliments daily on how helpful, resourceful, nice and educated she is, the "rep" that cleaned your carpet and furniture is an employee and has been employed with us for 8 years with zero complaints, only praised because he cares.  We are a family owned business and have been for 30 years.  Secondly...you claim we "contract"  for our work....sorry but that is false and misleading.  We do not use contractors..we use employees.  We refused to send a different technician because your husband called us approx 4 days after the job was completed and after you had moved in due to a "stain" reappearing.  We were more than happy to reservice your carpet at no charge but the technician who originally cleaned your carpet was already familiar with your carpet and had absolutely no problem in returning to satisfy you....I found it odd that your husband called back and canceled the reservice of your carpets.   We do have before and after pics of your furniture, they are like night and day and cleaned up perfectly.  If I am able to post the pics to this response I will.  I do however have a suspicion that since we performed the carpet cleaning BEFORE you moved in that during your moving process there was probably some soiling that occured....this is common, however it is still unfortunate you feel the need to leave a 1 star review.  We agreed to return to reservice your area and you refused.  We are a good, generous and honest company with many certifications and one of the only firms that is insured in the area.  We appreciate your business and wish you luck with your new home.

name: Adrienne G
text:
I have pets, 2 dogs to be exact.  I had friends stuck at my house during the height of COVID-19 with their 2 dogs.  Four animals in an 1100 sqft house for 7 months.  You get the picture.  Guest just left last month and I am still trying to clean up after all have left.  So I decided to refinance my house.  Then I received a call that my home needed an appraisal for my refinance.  Ok, no big deal, except the appraiser would be here in 1 week.  I needed my carpets cleaned FAST.  Panic set in when ALL my normal carpet cleaners in Newnan were unavailable until after appraisal date.  So, I searched for companies in LaGrange and read the reviews.
Pro Steam seemed like the best option.  I called and Ali was able to get me on their schedule same week.   Price was affordable, in my budget and primarily fit my time constraints.  Cam arrived on time, went over the house and was very thorough.   I really appreciated how quick Ali was able to get me scheduled due to extremely tight timeline. I was amazed that the products they used smelled refreshing AND DID NOT bother my sinuses at all!!!   That is saying something because glass cleaner will make my nose burn.  My carpets look like new, all the little "oops" stops are gone, house smells AMAZING.   Cam was here about 2 hours and I was able to continue working while my carpets were cleaned, even had a few calls and no issues at all with noise.
So, if you are looking for carpet cleaners, this local owned company is AWESOME!!!  Thanks, Adrienne G.

resp.text: Adrienne, thank you so much for your business.  We are glad you are happy and delighted with the cleaning and we were able to accommodate your time frame.  Give us a call anytime you need anything, we appreciate you.

text: Yesterday, Thursday the 18th of August, I Harold marks and My fiancé Ambreshia Landrum had our carpets cleaned by them. they couldn't get all the stains out, even though we paid 140$. More importantly, coincidentally, my fiancés engagement ring disappeared after they left. Even though we can't prove they stole the ring, connect the dots for me. Be careful who you let in your house!

name: Daniel Hadden
text: great company does good work

name: Judy Marshall
text: To cold
